DOC.brief_summary: Helicobacter pylorus ( H.pylori ) major human pathogenic bacterium gastric mucosa link development gastritis , peptic ulcer disease , mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue lymphoma gastric cancer . However regulatory mechanism H.pylori-induced immune response clear . Long non-coding RNA ( lncRNA ) recently emerge key post-transcriptional regulator gene expression , differentiation . The investigator preliminary result THRIL ( TNFÎ± hnRNPL relate immunoregulatory lincRNA ) PACER ( p50-associated COX-2 extragenic RNA ) play potential role H.pylori induce inflammatory cascade . However , n't previous study expression THRIL , PACER human tissue . Therefore , investigator aim evaluate expression THRIL , PACER patient gastrointestinal disease accord H.pylori infection .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Gastrointestinal Disease Helicobacter Pylori Controlled Long Non-coding RNA
